channel.title: happy on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in happy on Barefoot Rob

item.title: Great surprise party
item.description: (written 14:26 Tuesday 17 September 2019 JST) Honored to be invited to the event! Admired that Rin has connected lots of people who could easily become friends. Upon arrival, Rin cried as Hiro predicted. Everyone had a great time. I friended Chris just because he commented on the FB group. Talked to him about PB 49 and 52, assuring him I could talk about it all night (even though 13 years at wow)

item.title: Lazy day
item.description: 17:41 Monday 15 July 2019 JST Today after being out late last night at Lin’s sister’s place, I was happy that today is a holiday. I slept a good bit of the day.

item.title: Thank you, Emacs
item.description: 20:28 Thursday 20 December 2018 JST Super nice: I was able to figure out how to create a function to simplify the creation of web pages for Marble Track 3 Parts](https://www.marbletrack3.com/parts/). Now I just type C-c p in Emacs, then enter the title, tags, and shortcode to produce a file for a new Part in the Marble Track 3 website. Today, with said shortcode, I started the page for Medium Catcher Below Triple Splitter.

item.title: LouStar Banks of the Beautiful
item.description: 10:06 Thursday 11 January 2018 JST Really glad to hear LouStar has new tracks out! Not sure if this link will work, but I bought “Favourite” and “Not Gonna Lie” Not gonna lie, but “Favourite” is my favorite of the two. https://play.google.com/store/music/artist/Banks_Of_The_Beautiful

item.title: Good morning! おっはよう〜ございます！
item.description: 05:54 Sunday 05 February 2017 JST I woke up early today; I asked Noisy to wake me up at 5:25 so I could “get some work done” before heading to see Mikarin’s piano recital. I’m bummed I’ll miss SOGO (again (last week was due to choosing to prepare for Head Heart and Soul presentation (and the week before was cancelled by the organizers))), BUT as I sat down to “do work” I felt cold, tired, and was like, boom
